"Value for money!"  \- by  Pitanjal Dutta

An amazing bluetooth headphone. The colour I purchased is blue. The material
quality is truly amazing.  
The ear cups are fitting well. The headband is really comfortable. In the
initial days though the ear cups seem to be little too hard and tight on your
ears.However, over time it adjusts well accordingly and becomes comfortable.  
The controlling of volume and moving on to next track is very convenient with
the headphone switches.  
Coming to the most important part, the sound quality. The sound quality is
truly fantastic. The bass is powerful and at this price I am sure no one can
be a substitute. The bass actually sets you grooving and makes you tap your
foot :) The sound quality is absolutely crystal clear.  
The bluetooth range is simply fantastic and never interrupts. Battery life is
great, charging is fast. The feature of using it as wired makes it even a
better product when ...[ full review](/review/R2N9Y7FROGO4G3)
